Comments_List: I learned a great deal about the debates surrounding logical consequence and this course helped me to become a more nuanced thinker and better philosopher.
Clear and creative thinking; effective presenting.
Excellent course. Strengths are: fascinating material, emphasis on close reading rather than volume, intimate group, free flowing conversation, phenomenal instruction.
Yes! It was a fascinating class!

I highly recommend this course. Fascinating material, emphasis on close reading rather than volume, intimate group, free flowing conversation, phenomenal instruction. Professor Shin is an absolute gem -- brilliant, a very clear thinker, with a wonderful sense of humor, and a very kind heart.
